div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2207 Porto Empedocle, near Agrigento, 1896-1897 Burial: c. 260 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 11 EL, AR Carthage: 11 EL trist. (Jenkins-Lewis, Grp. VIII) dodecadr. (as J-L pl. 27, 1) decadr. (as J-L pl. 27, 2) hexadr. (as J-L pl. 27, 3) Disposition: Jameson 922 (trist.) Jenkins-Lewis, Carthage, p. 60 The actual find-spot may have been near Syracuse (Jenkins-Lewis)
